wikipedia_page.main: Peter Curtis  (born 29 August 1945 ) is a former British professional tennis player. Peter Curtis won one Grand Slam in mixed doubles with his then-wife Mary Ann Eisel Curtis.

link_mentions.page: List of US Open mixed doubles champions
response: | align="center"|1968 ||  Mary-Ann Eisel Peter Curtis ||  Tory Fretz Gerry Perry || 6–4, 7–5
*Peter Curtis (diplomat) (1929–2013), Australian public servant and diplomat
*Norah Lofts (1904–1983), British author, one of whose pen names is Peter Curtis
*Sir Peter Curtis, 6th Baronet (1907–1976) of the Curtis baronets
